content.raw:
In may case \(so far one sample, i.e. not representative\) IT IS MUCH WORSE! Two of four log files cannot be downloaded and the first `rosout.log` ends at 119s when the robot even enter the tunnel yet!

\`119.076000000 INFO /subt\_solution \[/home/developer/subt\_solution/src/subt\_seed/src/subt\_seed\_node.cc:94\(imageCallback\)\] \[topics: \] received Image 1200

\`17 hours of waiting for this result?!

‌
